Split Flowlines

Source: R/split_flowline.R
split_flowlines.Rd

A wrapper for split_lines that works on nhdplus attributes

split_flowlines(flines, max_length, para = 0)

Arguments

flines

data.frame with COMID, toCOMID, LENGTHKM, and TotDASqKM and LINESTRING sf column in "meters" projection
max_length

maximum segment length to return
para

numeric how many threads to use in parallel computation

Value

All the flowlines with some split apart.

See also

The refactor_nhdplus function implements a complete workflow using `split_flowlines()`.

Contents

  • Value
